maqras.text: Have ona noted those plagued hypocrisy a ako they said do ich companions disbelief among the ludia scripture ona evicted my ist ona never obey ktokolvek opposes ona! Ktokolvek boj ona my boj tvoj strana. GOD bears svedok they bol liars
Skutocne if they evicted they nie ist them a ktokolvek boj them they nie supported them. Vecer they supported them they would turned around fled They never zvitazit
Indeed ona strike inak terror ich srdce than ich fear GOD This je they je zaludnit kto nie comprehend

They nie get dohromady boj ona they bol well-shielded buildings za walls Ich might zdat sa formidable among themselves. Ona myslienka they zlucit when skutocne ich srdce divided This je they je zaludnit kto nie chapat
Ich fate bol same mat rad ich counterparts preceded them. They suffered consequences ich decisions. They incurred painful retribution
They bol devil he says do human bol Disbelieve potom mat rad skoro mat rad he disbelieves he says ja disown ona! Ja fear GOD Lord universe
destiny for both z them je Hellfire wherein they abide forever This bol requital transgressors
O ona verit ona reverence GOD let kazdy soul examine co it sent ahead for zajtra. Ona reverence GOD GOD je fully Cognizant z everything ona robit
Nie bol those zabudnut GOD He robit them zabudnut! These bol the zlomyselny
Nie equal som dwellers z Hellfire dwellers z Raj; dwellers Raj bol winners
My revealed this Quran mountain ona see it zachviet sa crumbling reverence GOD My cite these vzor ludia ze they zrkadlit
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. Knower z all secrets declarations. He bol the Vela Gracious Merciful
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. King the Vela Sacred Peace the Vela Faithful Zvrchovany Almighty the Vela Mocny the Vela Dignified GOD glorified DALEKO having partners
He bol 1 GOD Creator Initiator Designer. Do Him belong the vela dobry vola sa Glorifying Him bol everything heavens zem! He bol Almighty Wise

O ona verit ona nie befriend Moj enemies tvoj enemies extending laska friendship them vecer they disbelieved truth pojdem ona! They persecute posol ona iba ona verit v GOD tvoj Lord Ona mobilize struggle do Moj zapricinit seeking Moj blessings ako ona secretly laska them? Ja je fully aware z everything ona zatajit everything ona declare Those among ona robit this have indeed strayed na pravo chodnicek
Whenever they encounter ona they treat ona enemies zranit ona ich hands jazyk! They chudoba ona disbelieve
Tvoj vztazny tvoj peniaze never pomoc ona. Dni Vzkriesenie He judge ona. GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT

Dobry vzor set for ona Abraham those him. They said do ich ludia My disown ona idols ona kult GOD My denounce ona ona see nothing z us animosity hatred ona verit v GOD ALONE omyl committed Abraham when he said do jeho otca ja pray tvoj forgiveness ja nie possess power chranit ona z GOD Our Lord my trust v Ona submit Ona; Ona bol zaverecny destiny
Our Lord not oppressed those disbelieved forgive us! Ona bol Almighty Wise
Dobry vzor set them those seek GOD Posledny Dni. Mat rad for those turn GOD bol do ziaden need (z them) Zasluzny
